definitions.body: specif. earthquake, Am 1:1, Zec 14:5, 1Ki 19:11, 1Ki 19:11, 1Ki 19:12; fig. of ´[[י]]:’s judgement Is 29:6, Ez Eze 38:19; cf. (in vision) [[קוֹל]] [[גׇּרוֹל]] ´[[ר]]: Eze 3:12, Eze 3:13; prob. also Eze 37:7 (LXX Thes Co Krae; > rustling, rattling, Hi-Sm Toy); hence hyperbol. of shaking of earth by tramping of warriors Is 9:4, by war-chariots Je 47:3, cf. Je 10:22, or wheels Na 3:2, by war-horse (’s hoofs) Job 39:24 (+ [[רׂגֶז]]).
quaking, trembling, of pers. Ez Eze 12:18.
shaking, quivering, of dart Job 41:21 (al. rushing sound).
